name: Zhiguo Gong
content: Zhiguo GONG, Ph.D. – Faculty of Science and Technology Zhiguo GONG (鞏志國)Professor and the Head of Department of Computer and Information ScienceProfessor of the State Key Laboratory of Internet of Things for Smart CityOffice: E11-4090Tel: (+853)8822-4962Email: fstzgg@um.edu.mo Research Interests Machine Learning, Data Mining, Database, Information Retrieval Academic QualificationsPh.D. in Computer Science, Institute of Mathematics, Chinese Academy of Science, China (1998)M.S. in Mathematics, Peking University, China (1988)B.S. in Mathematics, Hebei Normal University, China (1983) Work Experience1999.9 – Now: Assistant Professor, Associate Professor, Full Professor, University of Macau1998.11- 1999.8: Project Coordinator, International Institute for Software Technology, United Nations University, Macau1998.9-1998.11: Postdoc, Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Science1983.8 – 1995.8:  Lecturer, Hebei Normal University, China Research Projects Publications Services Courses Biography
